column7: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (Who's In Charge) T- shirt
column8: Produced on what must have been an unjustly small budjet, this film still delivers the goods. Bizarre, stupid and unique, Sir Launcelot`s storming of the castle is a highlight (if I had to pick one) yet every scene is equally hilarious and the huge anticlimatic ending would not have dared been attempted by anyone else but the Pythons. For any of you who are unsure about Monty Python and whether or not you want to give their type of comedy a go, let me tell you, this film is the best to experiment with. The picture on this t-shirt is the scene were our hero`s meet the French!
column19: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (Who's In Charge) T- shirt
column20: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (Who's In Charge) T- shirt
column21: A t shirt admiring the joyous lunacy of the Monty Python gang, and their film, Monty Python and the Holy Grail. From weadmire.net.
